Title: Berney Pocket Watch Mini Pendant Sterling Silver 18k Gold Turquoise Enamel Case
Description: Berney Pocket Watch Mini Pendant Sterling Silver 18k Gold Turquoise Enamel Case Swedemom is proud to EXCLUSIVELY present this lovely Pocket watch pendant from Berney! One of the premier Swiss watch making families, BERNEY has been manufacturing timepieces of exceptional quality for many years. These exquisite pieces (both CASES and MOVEMENTS) are manufactured and assembled entirely at the factory in La Vallee de Joux in Switzerland. The round white 14mm dial (face) is signed "Berney," "Quartz" and "SWISS MADE." It bears black numbers, hour, and minute hands. The 20mm case back is decorated with embossed gold flowers over a turquoise enamel. The case is .925 sterling with an 18 kt overlay. This Quartz SWISS MOVEMENT pocket watch is of HEIRLOOM quality and is excellent, new condition. SHIPPING INFORMATION Buyers in The Continental U.S. will pay $5.99 shipping and handling.
